net.frozencode.jniolib.server

Interface JNioEventListener


  • public interface JNioEventListener
    The JNioEventListener interface provides method prototypes which can be invoked when their respective events occur in a JNioServer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClientConnected(JNioChannel client)
      Called when a client connects.
      void onClientDisconnected(JNioChannel client, boolean clean)
      Called when a client disconnects.
      void onDataRecieved(JNioChannel client)
      Called when data is received from a client.

    • Method Detail

      • onClientConnected

        void onClientConnected(JNioChannel client)
        Called when a client connects.
        Parameters:
        client - the client causing the event. Non-NULL.

      • onDataRecieved

        void onDataRecieved(JNioChannel client)
        Called when data is received from a client.
        Parameters:
        client - the client causing the event. Non-NULL.

      • onClientDisconnected

        void onClientDisconnected(JNioChannel client,
                          boolean clean)
        Called when a client disconnects.
        Parameters:
        client - the client causing the event. Non-NULL.
        clean - true if the client disconnected without causing an exception, false otherwise.
